ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities involved resolving duplicate wording issues on news posts, such as the 'happy holidays!' post, and integrating various mod articles for lazer, including cleanup of existing mod articles, addition of new ones, and standardization of mod fields.

ppy/osu.summary: The repository saw the implementation of a feature to mark beatmaps as played, enhancing user interaction with the platform.

ppy/osu-server-beatmap-submission.summary: Efforts focused on improving observability by integrating tools like Sentry and Datadog, and enhancing logging capabilities to better monitor and manage the beatmap submission process.

ppy/osu-web.summary: Developments included a proposal to include user tags in beatmap set searches, which would require an update to the beatmap search index to facilitate more targeted searches and improve user experience.
